name: Kerf Apartments

google_reviews.author: Happy Tails Happy Homes
google_reviews.review: Kerf apartments is an amazing place for any pet and pet parent to live! They have absolutely no breed or size restriction. Kerf has a pet spa with self washing station and is very conveniently located to many dog friendly trails and parks.  As a non profit dog rescue we 100% support  Kerf and love what they do to support the pets in our community!

google_reviews.author: T. Christon-Stewart
google_reviews.review: Beautiful property, with lush spaces and the most friendly hosts!! Looking forward to seeing all this place had to offer over the coming days. Perfect location to downtown fun. Can't miss and stop in!!

google_reviews.author: Sharlaine LaClair
google_reviews.review: This place is so beautiful! It has all the amenities, and amazing place for remote work or studying,  plus it's pet friendly. The units are spacious and have high end finishes. Love it!

google_reviews.author: Gary Vittoz
google_reviews.review: Everything is great. The only problem I had was getting my WiFi functioning. Xfinity repairman came and quickly identified and fixed the issue with the modem/router in my apartment. I took him down to explain it to Josh as it may be an issue with numerous apartments. Security seems quite robust and the new facility is very nice.

google_reviews.author: Felia Moresca
google_reviews.review: I applied site unseen, and I love living here. The amenities are beautiful, within walking distance from restaurants, grocery stores, WWU, and I love that it's a very dog friendly environment for my little chihuahua to run around

google_reviews.author: Ashlyn
google_reviews.review:
Kiara has been exceptional to work with! I have been looking at places to rent that have all the amenities I desire and am moving out of state so dont have the luxury to view in person. She did a FaceTime with me and went above and beyond showing me every unit I had questions on (which were a few, sorry and thank you!!).

I also was able to see all the common areas/amenities. While theres still some kinks to work out, shes made me feel confident they will deliver on what they promote. Everything is brand new and Im so excited to call this place home in a month with my two pups!  Im big on reviews, **especially** when looking at apartments/property mgmt companies and even more so when out of stateso I hope this helps someone else take the plunge bc trust that I will update this review to keep potential neighbors informed if anything becomes a major issue! Thank you
